Damage: Penetrates hull and shielding '''Capsule''': This unarmed vessel was designed to sneak up on an unsuspecting target and release a strike force directly onto the enemy vessel. Unlike other assault shuttles, the Spiral-class was completely unarmed, relying on its advanced stealth suite to allow the craft to achieve striking distance. Once the vessel reached its target's particle shields, a one-use proton charge would explode, causing the target's shields to weaken enough for the Spiral to pass through. Once through the shield, the Spiral smashed itself headlong into the target. The hull of the Spiral was composed of tekonite, which would vaporize upon collision, absorbing up to 92% of the damage. The resulting impact damage to the target ship allowed enemy forces to enter the vessel via hull breaches using vac-suits.
